name: content-tab
title: Content Tab
oneLiner: Tab component for content categorization and filtering

apiDoc.name: ContentTab
apiDoc.description: Displays tabs based on types of content users actually publish. Samples user content to conditionally show tabs with counts. Features customizable tab rendering via Svelte 5 snippet, sortable tabs, and optional click handlers. Uses createContentSampler builder for efficient content discovery. Perfect for feed filtering or user profile content categories.

props.name: pubkeys
props.description: Array of pubkeys to sample content from

props.name: kinds
props.description: Event kinds to check for tabs

props.name: since
props.description: Unix timestamp to limit content sampling

props.name: sort
props.description: Function to sort tabs before rendering

props.name: tab
props.description: Svelte 5 snippet for rendering each tab
